name: Gabhar
description:
The Idios team in collaboration with the Slieve Gullion Tourism Board and the SRC, have designed and created a short educational game, with the intent of spreading more awareness about the Old Irish Goats of South Armagh project. 

The Old irish Goat species has slowly been disappearing from the wilds of Ireland for the past 200 years, so in this game we have made it the players main objective to the restore the Old Irish Goats species to their former glory. One of the main goals in the design of the game was to make it educational about the Old Irish Goats of South Armagh project.  Hopefully this game can contribute to filling in the gap in tourism of the Ring of Gullion area, that has been caused by the occuring pandemic.
